name="Temple of Immortals" uiDescription="The immortal $npcName:23090005$ cannot be destroyed, but he can be contained for a time. On the edge of $map:02000200$, at the $map:02000037$, a hero must rise to combat the undying $npc:23090005$!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font>

name="Temple of Immortals" uiDescription="The immortal $npcName:23090005$ cannot be destroyed, but he can be contained for a time. On the edge of $map:02000200$, at $map:02000037$, a hero must rise to combat the undying $npc:23090005$!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Last of the Vayar" uiDescription="The ancients took the holy Vayar Mountain as their sanctuary and planted the stones of faith there, giving rise to the giant golems that would protect the sacred area. With their civilization in ruins, most of the Vayar have gone into hiding... but one has returned, at Bastei Peak.

name="Blueshade Cave" uiDescription="The warm-hearted Shoo from Snowfield took a poison arrow right to the heart, and froze their ticker with an ice fragment until they could get help. This had the unfortunate side effect of turning Shoo into a ravenous monster who has been wreaking havoc with their friend Booboo.

name="Warbot Rebellion" uiDescription="The MK 52 series of war robots was designed in secret by the brilliant Dr. Kartronic for unknown purposes. Surely his intentions were good, but now they appear to have gotten out of hand. Watch out for the Beta version, for its combat potential is significantly higher than that of the Alpha.

name="Horus's Nest" uiDescription="Once long ago, the top of $map:02000009$ was a grand forest. It was here that Horus made a nest... and here Horus plotted revenge against humans hunting eggs. Now the forest is thinned, and the nest is exposed. Who will take the fight to Horus?

name="Forgotten Vayar" uiDescription="The ancient civilization of the holy Vayar Mountains is no more, but their legacy can be found in the strangest places. Such as in an icy cave on a secluded beach... That is where the terrible $npcName:23000006$ has awakened.
name="Forest of Chaos" uiDescription="$npcName:23000025$ sows chaos to pave the way for his dark masters. This beast is the source of a potent curse that grips this once-peaceful forest.

name="Demon Tree" uiDescription="A dormant demon tree has begun controlling villagers, forcing them to worship statues the tree has imbued with pure evil. If this is allowed to continue, such evil will eventually conquer all of humanity.
<font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot instant revive if you have Soul's Respite.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot use Mesos to instant revive.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Shadow Altar" uiDescription="The $map:02000213$ is the base of the mighty $npcName:23000007$, who uses it to bring his army into Maple World. Any who would challenge $npcName:23000007$ must survive his corrupting darkness.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Shadow Altar" uiDescription="The $map:02000213$ is the base of the mighty $npcName:23000007$, who uses it to bring his army into Maple World. Any who would challenge $npcName:23000007$ must survive his corrupting darkness.

name="Tronix Bunker" uiDescription="The most powerful of Dr. Kartronic's war robots was considered a failure because it could not be controlled. No one knows when $npcName:23000056$ will finally escape their prison in $map:02000232$ and destroy everything.

name="Moonlight Fortress" uiDescription="For ages, boats have occasionally gone missing in the middle of the ocean. They leave no remains, either, adding to the mystery. Somewhere out there, a phantom pirate ship stalks the waves. What could they be doing out there?

name="Moonlight Fortress" uiDescription="For ages, boats have occasionally gone missing in the middle of the ocean. They leave no remains, adding to the mystery. Somewhere out there, a phantom pirate ship stalks the waves. What could it be doing out there?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>
name="Ludibrium Clock Tower" uiDescription="The biggest clock tower in Maple World has stopped ticking. What's going on inside the tower?

name="Ludibrium Clock Tower" uiDescription="The biggest and grandest clock tower in Maple World has stopped ticking. Could something be wrong inside the tower?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Hemokan the Fallen" uiDescription="$npcName:23000039$ has awakened from its transformation within the Shadow Seeds sowed by corrupted fairies. As the vile energies gather, $npcName:23000039$ grows stronger and more enraged. Who will be the one to face the beast and lay it to rest? Protect $map:02000023$ from the savage $npc:23000039$!

name="Burning Pamokan" uiDescription="Strange fires have been sparked all over Victoria Island, and their source appears to be $map:02000079$! The harbinger of flames, $npcName:23000041$, has emerged from the lava and returned to terrorize the populace. Can you drive back $npcName:23000041$ and stop the spreading flames?

name="The Fire Dragon" uiDescription="The dark fairfolk have driven $npcName:23100011$ mad, and he's torching everything in sight. Who will face the flames of $map:02000311$ and end the menace?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Revivals are limited in safe zones.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Waterbug Park" uiDescription="Due to the outrageous insect infestation, $map:02010019$ has been closed to the public. According to $npcName:11001342$, the ones that appeared with the insect captain were acting like soldiers searching for something... For now, sweep out the insects so $map:02010019$ can reopen for business!

name="Lubelisk" uiDescription="Lubelisk, the shrine of the fallen Merjit kingdom, exudes a powerful darkness. What could Varrekant, a visitor from the other world, want from there? Recover the stolen Lumenstone and defeat Varrekant!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Lubelisk" uiDescription="Lubelisk, the shrine of the fallen Merjit kingdom, exudes a powerful darkness. What could Varrekant, a visitor from the other world, want from there? Recover the stolen Lumenstone and defeat Varrekant!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Rune Temple" uiDescription="Deep within this divine sanctuary, the Rune Shamans hid a magic weapon of untold power, the Runicta. Its guardian sits beside it in an enchanted sleep, awaiting a disciple of the runic arts capable of wielding the weapon's incredible power. Will you awaken the ancient titan?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Rune Temple" uiDescription="Deep within this divine sanctuary, the Rune Shamans hid a magic weapon of untold power, the Runicta. Its guardian sits beside it in an enchanted sleep, awaiting a disciple of the runic arts capable of wielding the weapon's incredible power. Will you awaken the ancient titan?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="BeyondLink Tris" uiDescription="$npcName:23000081$ is the deceitful director of a humanoid engineering project! His dangerous research is nearing its final stage, culminating in the birth of a new army to rival the Penumbran Host! Who will defeat $npcName:23000081$ and stop his research once and for all?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="The Song of the Oracle" uiDescription="The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Guardian of the Seas" uiDescription="The reclusive guardian's call reverberates from the depths of the ocean. Seized by a dark rage, he bellows in warning. What exactly is he trying to tell the humans above?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Icethorn Ridge" uiDescription="It is said that somewhere at the foot of $map:02000381$, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path only appears to a few, and when it does, an icy wail travels along it, frightening away any who might dare enter. Who or what could be hiding within?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Malevolent Manor" uiDescription="A large, eerie manor has been discovered north of the Shadow Gate. Though it seems deserted, a malevolent aura emanates from within. What atrocity must have happened within, oh so long ago?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Madrakan Ramparts" uiDescription="The invasion of Madrakan, Madria's fortress, has begun! The Maple Alliance has it surrounded, but its thick castle walls are preventing entry. The only way to conquer Madrakan now is to somehow storm the gateway, and only true heroes could be up to the task.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Madrakan's Heart" uiDescription="It only takes one small crack to compromise the strongest of armor. So too it is with a fortress. The Maple Alliance has put together an elite team to invade Madrakan and put an end to a threat that has long plagued the alliance.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Golden Tower 7F" uiDescription="Black market dealers from the Land of Darkness have hit the jackpot, breaking through the tight regulations that control trade in Maple World. Get into their hideout and learn their illicit secrets!

name="Golden Tower 4F" uiDescription="Black market dealers from the Land of Darkness have hit the jackpot, breaking through the tight regulations that control trade in Maple World. Get into their hideout and learn their illicit secrets!

name="Golden Tower Elevator" uiDescription="Black market dealers from the Land of Darkness have hit the jackpot, breaking through the tight regulations that control trade in Maple World. Get into their hideout and learn their illicit secrets!

name="Cusp of Life" uiDescription="The great barrier of life that maintains order in the mortal world is under siege. Someone seeks to claim the Green Lapenta of Life, and is willing to destroy the barrier entirely to do it. Fight to protect the source of all life!

name="The Poison Cave" uiDescription="The naturally-occurring poisons of the Land of Darkness are spilling over into Maple World! This isn't an accident... someone is trying to poison the whole world. They're trying to stay out of sight, but an intrepid hero might be able to track them down.
name="Palace Undercroft" uiDescription="Within the dark halls beneath Tria Palace, a piercing scream rings out. What awaits you in the Palace Undercroft?

name="Cherry Blossom Forest" uiDescription="The beautiful Cherry Blossom Forest is home of the boroboros, or fairfolk dwarves. Over the years, they've grown more and more reclusive, until at last they were forgotten. Now, a cry for help can be heard from these mysterious reaches. What could have happened to them?

name="Ludible Time Hall" uiDescription="$map:02000298$ is the secret research station founded to study temporal mechanics and develop a functioning a time machine on behalf of the $map:02000309$ in $map:02000270$. Everything was going fine, until the place was besieged by unknown assailants.
name="Katramus Depths" uiDescription="The Cruel Tower of Katramus is the greatest slaver's camp in the Land of Darkness. Join the Lumina Liberation Army and strike a blow for freedom!
name="Katramus Heights" uiDescription="The Cruel Tower of Katramus is the greatest slaver's camp in the Land of Darkness. Join the Lumina Liberation Army and strike a blow for freedom!

name="Root of Darkness" uiDescription="There's a legend in the Land of Darkness about the seed of darkness, an object which can birth new descendants of the demon king! Once the seed sprouts and the roots are set, it is said that darkness will engulf the world…

name="Casa de Luna" uiDescription="Once the moon lost its light, an unknown shadow fell over $map:02010047$. Taking advantage of the darkness, an ancient shaman has plotted to grow his power and threaten the world!

name="Coldwind Cave" uiDescription="The waterway that crosses the village starts underground. The villagers give offerings to the underground tunnel creature, out of fear that the waterway will be shut off. Who could do such a thing?

name="Blaknov No. 1" uiDescription="An unruly mob has seized Blackstar's main transportation, the Blaknov! $npcName:11001460$'s suborindate $npcName:11003124$ is trapped on the train and needs to be rescued. Why was the Blaknov taken in the first place? Stop the runaway train and find out!

name="Lingering Darkness" uiDescription="You thought it was over. You thought his treachery and evil had been ended. But the seed of darkness in his heart would not let him rest. When will this darkness truly end?

name="Blaknov No. 2" uiDescription="An unruly mob has seized Blackstar's main transportation, the Blaknov! $npcName:11001460$'s suborindate $npcName:11003125$ is trapped on the train and needs to be rescued. Why was the Blaknov taken in the first place? Stop the runaway train and find out!

name="Sanctum of the Sage" uiDescription="The villainous $npcName:11001778$ is after the Animus Lamp, the artifact of a secret order of martial artist beastfolk. Join $npcName:24002718$ and $npcName:24002719$ as they fight to expel evil from their order's sanctum and restore light to the darkness.

name="Muros Studio" uiDescription="It's the first day of filming, but the big star is nowhere to be found! Time is short, and the director is desperate to find a replacement actor. This is your chance to make your TV debut, and take a shot at stardom! Will you step into the spotlight?

name="Guardian of the Seas" uiDescription="The reclusive guardian's call reverberates from the depths of the ocean. Seized by a dark rage, he bellows in warning. What exactly is he trying to tell the humans above?

name="The Song of the Oracle" uiDescription="The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.

name="Madrakan's Heart" uiDescription="A small crack can grow and eventually lead to the downfall of an impenetrable fortress. The Maple Alliance has put together an elite team to invade Madrakan. It's time to end one of the greatest threats to the Maple Alliance!

name="Madrakan Ramparts" uiDescription="The siege of Madrakan, the stronghold of Madria, has begun! The Maple Alliance has it surrounded, but its thick castle walls are preventing entry. The only way to conquer Madrakan now is to somehow storm the gateway—a task for a true hero!

name="Chateau of Grief" uiDescription="A huge manor has been discovered at one corner of the Shadow Gate. It's deserted, but there's a malicious aura all around it. What happened in there, so long ago?

name="Icethorn Ridge" uiDescription="It is said that at the foot of a mountain, hidden within a raging snowstorm, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path appears to precious few, and those who see it are frightened away by a terrifying cry. Who or what could be hiding there?

name="Normal Frostpillar Temple" uiDescription="A temple to a lost kingdom. A dark shadow that stands watch. No adventurer has ever survived long enough to uncover the temple's secrets...
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Normal Madrakan Spire" uiDescription="The Maple Alliance has successfully marched into the Madrakan Spire, where everyone now awaits the final showdown against Madria. To clench victory, the Maple Alliance is in dire need of elite heroes. Gather the best fighters you can and put an end to Madrakan!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Normal Rock 'n' Rollin' Pink Bean" uiDescription="An unidentifiable, bizarre creature has appeared in the Temple of Time. Protect the temple.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Rock 'n' Rollin' Pink Bean" uiDescription="An unidentifiable, bizarre creature has appeared in the Temple of Time. Protect the temple.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Premium Dungeon" uiDescription="A special area for premium club members only! Here you can change into your desired character and break as many statues as you can within the time limit to earn large sums of money.

name="Pipi's Secret Warehouse" uiDescription="Pipi's secret warehouse hidden in the passage of time! His inventions are causing trouble in the Maple World. Let's confuse Pipi before he makes another new invention!

name="Cathy Mart Part-Time Job" uiDescription="$npc:11001985$ has a thriving business and is ready to expand! She's recruiting staff for her newly opened express mart. Can you survive the fast-paced low-pay life of an order fulfillment center worker? Gather up a 4-member party and find out!

name="Abandoned Mine B1" uiDescription="Rare and precious treasure is hidden in the abandoned mine. Can you find your way through the labyrinthine mine, avoiding the hidden monsters and dangerous traps to find the treasure?
<font color='#00aaef'>• A special key is required to enter the Abandoned Mine.</font>

name="Abandoned Mine B4" uiDescription="Rare and precious treasure is hidden in the abandoned mine. Can you find your way through the labyrinthine mine, avoiding the hidden monsters and dangerous traps to find the treasure?
<font color='#00aaef'>• A special key is required to enter the Abandoned Mine.</font>

name="Testing Grounds" uiDescription="$npcName:21800006$, a good friend of $npcName:11000134$, has created a place where the warriors of Murpagoth can train their wits and their skills. Are you up to the challenge?

name="Toxic Garden" uiDescription="The old crown said these were tulip seeds. Instead, giant poisonous plants sprouted from the ground, turning the park into a $map:02000328$! It's time to do some weeding.

name="Operation Hen Rescue" uiDescription="A troop of monkeys has cluck-napped the hens from $map:02000087$ and locked them up in cages! With the cauldron set to boil, there's not much time to save them. Get in there and help those hens fly the coop!

name="Twinkling Path" uiDescription="The children frolicking in picturesque $map:02000331$ are in danger! They've hidden deep in the forest to avoid the grouchy mage, but they need help getting out. Go find them and help them escape.

name="Watchtower Rampart" uiDescription="From beyond $map:2000334$, wild pigs have gathered to attack the castle walls. We can't lose a watchtower to a bunch of pigs! Defeat the wild pigs and protect $map:2000334$!

name="Dark Descent" uiDescription="Evil lurks in the Dark Descent. Battle your way down to the source of the darkness and vanquish it before it destroys all that is pure and good!
<font color='#00aaef'>• If you forfeit while in the dungeon, you will not earn any points or rewards. Collected Havi fruits are reset roughly every 8 weeks.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge.</font>

name="Illusory Pyramid" uiDescription="The pyramid has stood silent as a monument to the collapsed Merjit kingdom. But recently, the dead have been rising from their graves in this area. What is causing them to return? The answer must be deep within the pyramid...

name="Frozen Temple" uiDescription="A mysterious girl has taken up residence in the forgotten temple, and ice has begun to cover the ancient halls. Who is she, and what does she hope to achieve there?

name="Labyrinthine Halls" uiDescription="Nazkar Temple was once the home of the dragons known as the Guides of Light. Ages have passed since the dragons vanished, and rumors are swirling that darkness gathers in their absence. What lies within the shadows engulfing Nazkar?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Duel on the Deck" uiDescription="Captain $npcName:11003582$ is worried that she's out of practice with her swords, so she wants you to spar with her.
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

name="Training Yard Tussle" uiDescription="Test your limits by sparring with the Royal Guard's top brass!
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

name="Nairin's Combat Simulator" uiDescription="Will you be worthy of the machine power taken to analyze your combat technique? Only Nairin's Combat Simulator can provide the answer!
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

name="Trial by Ordeal" uiDescription="A time-honored test of destiny. Can you defeat the Templar and reveal your fate?
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

name="Close Quarters" uiDescription=""Kill or be killed." This is training, Schatten-style.
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

name="Wrath of Infernog" uiDescription="Infernog, the great immortal monarch has finally awoken. The only way to stop this ancient, immortal balrog is to use the Sky Fortress's ultimate weapon to blast him into outer space.
<font color='#00aaef'>Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>When Infernog descends from his ship, player revival will be restricted.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>Special items are required to fight against Infernog:</font> <font color='#00aaef'>$item:20000762$, $item:20000763$</font> (Sold by the Goods Quartermaster) <font color='#FFD400'>A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Event Ludibrium Clock Tower" uiDescription="Can you overcome Papulatus, the master of time? Conquer him and you can obtain an item that exists between past and future. Take up the paradox of Papulatus before the rift of Ludibrium closes.
<font color='#FFD400'>• Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Emerald Prison" uiDescription="The power of the Green Lapenta has coalesced in this place, the $map:02020101$. $npcName:23000116$ has taken residence here, where she harvests the lives of all who trespass. Defeat her to return her to her normal self! \n<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Azure Flux" uiDescription="The power of the Blue Lapenta has coalesced in this place, the $map:02020111$. $npcName:23000117$ is using the area as a testing ground for his newfound powers. He must be stopped before he sets his eyes on the greater world! \n<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Terminus of Time" uiDescription="The power of the Red Lapenta has coalesced in this place, the $map:02020120$. $npcName:23000118$ holds dominion over the flow of time here. Survive the chaos of his temporal tyranny and restore him to his true self! \n<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Blackshard Nexus" uiDescription="$map:02020130$ has become a vortex of unstable lapenta energy. If this build-up isn't stopped, it will be impossible to save Maple World—or the Runeblades who are trapped in the middle of this crisis. \n<font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot instant revive if you have Soul's Respite.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot use Mesos to instant revive.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

name="Arcana Delphion" uiDescription="The infamous demon-god, $npcName:23000072$, hungers for souls. In an attempt to summon it for his master, $npcName:23000301$ is preparing to offer up his own soul. Can you thwart $npcName:23000301$ before $npcName:11004430$'s vile scheme comes to pass? • Safe revivals are limited in this challenge. • A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Weapon, Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epic Exceptional Adventuring Gear +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Epics +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 60 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score.

name="Aetherine Citadel Strike" uiDescription="$npcName:23090006$ came to Kritias in search of ever greater power. He has set his sights on the $map:02020097$. It is time to teach him that even immortals can be killed. • Safe revivals are limited in this challenge. • A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Weapon Lv. 70 Epic Exceptional Adventuring Gear +10 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epics +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Epics +10 Earrings, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Cape, Necklace, Ring Lv. 60 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score.

name="Hard Ancient Aetherine Mine" uiDescription="$npcName:23400072$ lives! Only you stand between this self-proclaimed god and the destruction of everything you hold dear. Will you take a stand to save Kritias... and the world? • You must equip the standard weapon type for your job to enter. • Match your attacks to the element icon over each of Zakum's arms. • Safe revivals are limited in this challenge. • You cannot use Mesos to instant revive. • Reward limit is shared with the $dungeonTitle:23041003$ dungeon. • A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Weapon, Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epics +13 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Epics +13 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score. However, this dungeon is extremely challenging! You may need a higher gear score and lots of practice in order to clear it.

name="Normal Ancient Aetherine Mine" uiDescription="$npcName:23400072$ lives! Only you stand between this self-proclaimed god and the destruction of everything you hold dear. name="Queen Bean Arena" uiDescription="$npcName:11004285$, queen of the Pink Beans, has descended upon Maple World! The $npcName:11004285$ Rumble is a tournament between Maple World's craziest heroes. Can you bring a little excitement to Her Majesty's humdrum life? Clear Condition: Clear Round 1 or higher The challenge ends automatically when your health reaches 0. You must equip the standard weapon type for your job to enter. Your reward is based on how many rounds you cleared. You can't advance to the next round if you don't meet its gear score requirement. Your ranking is recorded after you select 'Start Over.' • Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Rounds 1-3: 19400 Weapon Lv. 70 Epics +13 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epics +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Rounds 4-7: 24000 Weapon Lv. 70 Epics +14 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Rounds 8-10: 24000 Weapon Lv. 70 Legendaries +11 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score.

name="[Event] Black Onyx Tower" uiDescription="★ Gear Score Tips ★ Weapon : Lv. 70 Legendary +13 Top (Suit), Bottoms, Headgear, Gloves, Shoes : Lv. 70 Legendary +11 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt : Lv. 70 Epic Tairen accessories \nAn event is being held by Blackstar. They're willing to provide adventurers with powerful equipment to those who have proven their ability. I'm not really sure why or what the purpose for this is, but it doesn't seem like there's anything wrong to participate…? Don't miss the opportunity to come and prove your ability to win rewards. \n• Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge. This dungeon for 1 player only.

name="숨겨진 격납고" uiDescription="<font color='#FFD400'>* 아이템 점수 가이드</font> <font color='#00aaef'>무기, 상의, 하의</font> : 70레벨 <font color='#ffd533'>레전더리</font> 등급 인챈트 13단계 <font color='#00aaef'>모자, 장갑, 신발</font> : 70레벨 <font color='#ff8c37'>에픽</font> 등급 인챈트 10단계 <font color='#00aaef'>귀고리, 망토, 목걸이, 반지, 벨트</font> : 70레벨 <font color='#ffd533'>레전더리</font> 등급 
타이렌 왕국의 최신 병기, 아르케온. 최강의 로봇이 $npcName:11004683$의 손에서 다시 태어나려 하고 있다는데…검은군단 최고의 전력이 될지도 모르는 그를 무슨 일이 있어도 막아내야 한다!
